item.title: About Luana
item.description: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ I am Luana Martins, a post-doctoral researcher at the University of Salerno (UNISA). I am working under the supervision of Prof. Dario Di Nucci in the RECHARGE project that proposes a novel framework for automating performance testing in CI/CD pipelines by leveraging static analysis and search-based algorithms. In 2024, I concluded my Ph.D. in Computer Science at the Federal University of Bahia (UFBA), Brazil, under the supervision of Prof.
